nodes.text: The Internal Organization Bureau, or abbreviated as IntOrg, was a branch in the Galactic Empire's Imperial Intelligence organization. They operated IntSec, the service's internal intelligence department, and IntCon, the service's counter-intelligence department.

The Internal Organization Bureau was first mentioned in the new Star Wars canon in Dawn of Rebellion, a roleplaying supplementary sourcebook for the Star Wars Roleplaying series that was published by Fantasy Flight Games in 2018. IntOrg also existed in the Star Wars Legends continuity, being first mentioned in the 1989 Imperial Sourcebook, which was authored by Greg Gorden and published by West End Games. IntOrg performed a similar role in Legends as it does in canon.
